This is a little mod I made for a True Fan of my 
(Youtube Let\'s play on my channel -Grimreaperno666-)
descriptionHtml:
Grim\'sLadiesofPowerAlexus

This is a little mod I made for a True Fan of my 
(Youtube Let\'s play on my channel -Grimreaperno666-)

Here\'s to you Epic Phil,the companion you always been looking for
Alexus J. Epica an Imperial Thief who was raised by Elfs to be the
best Archer in the world.She has many,many Destruction spells
at the ready as well as some nice healing spells.

You can locate her inside the Riverwood Inn just hanging out
with my other friends.Her Armor and Weapons were given to her by
her those who loved her and wanted to make sure she had 
what it took to survive.


Instruction: 
Using Nexus Mod manager just download the
file and it will install by it\'s self.
or doing it manaully,simply download the file by hitting the manual
button and using the winrar(Free program)-google it if you
don\'t have already.Drag the file inside the Grim folder 
into your Skyrim Data Folder and click on the file when you 
start up Skyrim in the Data section of the loader.
I hope you all enjoy my Companions
author: Daryle Nolan AkA The Grim Reaper
